Devilcat doesn't seem to notice the fireballs as they glance off his 
energy shield.  In reality he does, but he's concentrating on Talon.  
He fires a burst of energy from his laser sword just before the pair 
reach melee range, then strikes out with a lateral slash.

(Riekan's not using lasers, by the way - it's all solid 
projectiles.)  The shark-like Riekan continues his assault, launching 
another harpoon, this one with a towline attached instead of the 
exploding variety - rather like long-distance spearfishing.

Torin gently examines the damage Jayde has taken, seemingly oblivious 
to the battle around him.
